name: HQ Leadership
description: 10 years ago horses brought us together from different parts of the world - Isabelle from Austria and Dhruv who was living in the USA at that time. We see the joy horses bring on people's faces every day, should it be a 3 year old girl or a 65 year old business man. We believe that horses teach us a lot about ourselves and they make us confident and great leaders in business as well as private life. Since 2007, Isabelle has been working in various cities in India. In the past few years Isabelle was engaged in senior management positions for BMW and Liebherr. After managing a team of 100+ people it became evident that the most important ingredient for success is an effective leadership style. Isabelle implemented learning's from the work with her horses to the business environment.

enhanced_description: HQ Leadership offers unique experiential leadership training workshops that leverage interaction with horses to foster confidence and effective leadership skills for both professional and personal development. The company was co-founded by Isabelle, whose extensive senior management experience at global firms like BMW and Liebherr, including leading teams of over 100 people, highlighted the crucial role of effective leadership. She integrated lessons from her work with horses into the business environment to develop this innovative approach. Their distinctive methodology, known as HorseDream, focuses on developing key leadership attributes such as emotional intelligence, communication skills, increased confidence, and enhanced teamwork. Participants gain valuable insights into body language, non-verbal communication, and trust-building through direct engagement with horses, making the learning profound and memorable.
